filtering_criteria.description: Google Models filtering configuration based on production readiness, documentation compliance, and billing requirements

exclude_descriptions: Access to this model requires billing to be enabled on the associated Google Cloud Platform account

exclude_specific_models.name: models/gemini-flash-latest
exclude_specific_models.reason: Preview model - gemini-flash-latest is a preview pointer per Sep 25 2025 Google update (https://developers.googleblog.com/en/continuing-to-bring-you-our-latest-models-with-an-improved-gemini-2-5-flash-and-flash-lite-release/). Note: preview tag not mentioned in API response.

exclude_specific_models.name: models/gemini-flash-lite-latest
exclude_specific_models.reason: Preview model - gemini-flash-lite-latest is a preview pointer per Sep 25 2025 Google update (https://developers.googleblog.com/en/continuing-to-bring-you-our-latest-models-with-an-improved-gemini-2-5-flash-and-flash-lite-release/). Note: preview tag not mentioned in API response.

exclude_specific_models.name: models/gemini-pro-latest
exclude_specific_models.reason: Preview model - gemini-pro-latest is an unstable alias pointer that lacks proper model identification and version awareness compared to stable gemini-2.5-pro. Confirmed via direct model prompting test on Sep 26 2025. Note: preview tag not mentioned in API response.

exclude_specific_models.name: models/gemini-2.5-flash-native-audio-latest
exclude_specific_models.reason: Preview model - gemini-2.5-flash-native-audio-preview-09-2025 (https://ai.google.dev/gemini-api/docs/models#gemini-2.5-flash-live). Note: preview tag not mentioned in API response.

exclude_reasons.billing_required: Model requires billing/payment - free models only
exclude_reasons.specific_preview_model: Preview model identified via external documentation - production-ready models only

include_descriptions.embedding_models: Models containing 'embedding' or 'embed' - text embedding models for semantic search and similarity
include_descriptions.image_generation: Models containing 'imagen', 'image', or 'img' - image generation and processing models
include_descriptions.video_generation: Models containing 'veo', 'video', or 'vid' - video generation and processing models
include_descriptions.specialized_ai: Models containing 'aqa' or 'learnlm' - specialized AI models (AQA for question answering, LearnLM for learning)
